list.name: Security Events
list.query: from(bucket:"sensors") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "security_events" and r["device_id"] == "$device_id") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "event")

targets.query: from(bucket:"sensors") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "DS1" and r["device_id"] == "$device_id") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => not exists r.unit) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value <= 1) |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value > 0 then 1 else 0 })) |> group() |> last()
from(bucket:"sensors") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "DUS1" and r["device_id"] == "$device_id") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket:"sensors") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "DPIR1") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "$device_id") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => not exists r.unit) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value <= 1) |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value > 0 then 1 else 0 })) |> group() |> last()

from(bucket:"actuators") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "DL") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "$device_id") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value") |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value > 0 then 1 else 0 })) |> group() |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true) |> limit(n: 1)

from(bucket:"actuators") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "DB") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "$device_id") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value") |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value > 0 then 1 else 0 })) |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "device_id"]) |> last()

from(bucket:"sensors") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "DMS") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "$device_id") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => not exists r.unit) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value <= 1) |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value > 0 then 1 else 0 })) |> last()

from(bucket:"sensors") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "security_events" and r["device_id"] == "$device_id") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "event" or r._field == "state" or r._field == "alarm_reason" or r._field == "occupancy") |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value") |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true) |> limit(n: 50)
